data.content: Conclusion: No attack occurred in this step. The log records only the start of standard EWC training with typical hyperparameters and no metrics. There is no evidence of Brainwash, Accumulative Attack, or Label Flipping at this stage. Proceed to collect Avg Acc and BWT after training; flag as attacked only if Acc ≤55% or BWT ≤-15.
[분석: 초기 모델 학습 (EWC) 로그] save summary

{"summary": "Conclusion: No attack occurred in this step. The log records only the start of standard EWC training with typical hyperparameters and no metrics. There is no evidence of Brainwash, Accumulative Attack, or Label Flipping at this stage. Proceed to collect Avg Acc and BWT after training; flag as attacked only if Acc ≤55% or BWT ≤-15."}

Determination: Inversion Attack occurred and executed successfully. Evidence: logs explicitly denote 'Inverse Attack' and show continued decreases in BN feature-statistics loss and an extremely low, further-declining classification loss (p≈0.9984 for the target class). Regularization terms (norm and TV) remain stable, indicating no representation collapse. Conclusion: This step is an effective Inversion Attack; there is no evidence of Brainwash, Accumulative Attack, or Label Flipping in this step.

분석: Brainwash Reckless Mode 실행 로그

Determination: Brainwash attack (Reckless Mode) occurred and executed successfully. The command line and run headers confirm mode='reckless', and the run ended with exit_code=0. The attack impact is severe: last-task accuracy fell to 36.1%, far below clean EWC (~68.3%) and below the reported Brainwash reckless baseline (~51.0%). Average accuracy declined to 14.6% on 10-way tasks—only 1.46× random—indicating catastrophic backward forgetting. Training remained numerically stable, so the degradation is due to effective poisoning rather than optimizer failure. There is no evidence of Accumulative Attack or Label Flipping in this step.
[분석: Brainwash Reckless Mode 실행 로그] save summary

Determination: Brainwash attack occurred and its impact is confirmed in this final evaluation. Evidence: the run applies adversarial noise from a checkpoint (--addnoise; 'Using noise from checkpoint') and yields catastrophic forgetting: BWT worsened from -0.0174 to -0.4786; prior-task average accuracy collapsed from 56.37% to 10.02% (overall 13.6%); tasks 1–9 are near chance; last-task accuracy is 46.0%, far below clean baselines. There is no evidence of Accumulative Attack or Label Flipping in this step.
